general.aboutText:
Meet Luca and Jakob, a dynamic duo of professional programmers who share a passion for crafting efficient, fast, and intuitive software solutions. Their collaborative journey began with a shared vision of creating innovative digital experiences that enhance users' lives.

Having successfully navigated several projects together, Luca and Jakob have proven their prowess in the world of programming. Their dedication and expertise recently earned them the prestigious second place in a challenging software competition.

One of their notable achievements is the creation of a social media app and multiple websites for their school. Currently, the duo is immersed in multiple projects, each reflecting their innovative approach to problem-solving. One standout project involves the development of a vocabulary learning app that employs gamification techniques to make the process more engaging and enjoyable. By blending education with entertainment, Luca and Jakob aim to revolutionize the way people acquire new language skills.

Their collaborative process is marked by a seamless synergy, with Luca's attention to detail complementing Jakob's creative problem-solving. Together, they form a dynamic team that thrives on challenges and consistently delivers high-quality software solutions.

Luca and Jakob's commitment to excellence extends beyond the technical aspects of programming. They understand the importance of user experience and continuously strive to create software that not only performs flawlessly but also provides a delightful and intuitive interaction for users.
general.title: projectEic

0.title: Grouping
0.text: We collaborated with one of our friends on a project developed using Flutter. Our project, called Grouping, was designed to address the challenges of event management and improve the functionality of groups compared to other social media apps, such as WhatsApp. Due to the considerable expenses associated with maintaining an app and the costs of listing it on app stores, we decided to make it available exclusively as an open-source Docker version, which allows users to host it on their own. The app is available for iOS, Android, and Windows.

1.title: PerformQuizz
1.text: Our upcoming vocabulary app introduces a gamified learning experience for students. Designed with a playful approach, the app allows students to enhance their vocabulary skills while engaging in entertaining games. Making learning enjoyable, this innovative app aims to transform education into an interactive and rewarding experience. Stay tuned for an exciting way to learn and expand your vocabulary!

2.title: School-Website of the St. Josef Gymnasium Dingelstädt
2.text: We helped our school's digital transformation by developing a comprehensive school website integrated with a user-friendly CMS system. This system empowers teachers to effortlessly create news posts that provide insights into the daily life at our school. Throughout this project, we gained valuable experience in customer collaboration, fine-tuning the project to meet their specific requirements, and ensuring customer satisfaction through multiple feedback polls aimed at optimizing the website's functionality.

3.title: A virtual school walkthrough
3.text: Amid the challenges posed by the Covid-19 pandemic, our former school found itself in need of an innovative solution to host its annual open day online. In collaboration with a dedicated group of friends, we started a project to create a website that offers a virtual walkthrough of the school, showcasing each subject area and various other aspects of the school environment. This first version was realized in 2021, and a year later, the website was redesigned by enhancing the website's overall look and feel. By 2023, we successfully integrated this virtual tour into the school's official website. My primary focus throughout this endeavor was on frontend development and design, ensuring that the online experience effectively represented the school's offerings and atmosphere.
